name: Losant
description: Losant is a powerful, easy-to-use enterprise IoT platform.

url.title: Devices URL
url.description: Used to query the API for devices. Should be a valid HTTP endpoint which resolves to an array of devices. Using query parameters to filter query is valid.

accessToken.title: Access Token
accessToken.description: Access tokens identify calling users, applications or services to make calls to an API. Refer to the documentation of the selected source to see how you can get a valid access token.

applicationId.title: Application ID
applicationId.description: The ID of the application which owns the devices. You can copy this directly from the application's page in the Losant platform.
